price: Kuleni na kunyweni kwa furaha kwa yale mliyo kuwa mkiyatenda.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Wataambiwa kwa kuamkiwa na kukirimiwa: Kuleni na mnywe chakula na vinywaji kwa starehe kwa sababu ya vitendo vyema mlivyo kuwa mkivitenda duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
